artist: Painter: After Rembrandt Harmensz. van Rijn; Etcher: Comte de Caylus
description: Joseph stands at center embracing his brother Benjamin while older brothers kneel before him; (the original drawing was formerly attributed to Rembrandt)
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

in plate: Rembrandt in     10   C. Sc. | below image in black: Rembrandt del  C. Scul. / Joseph est reconnu par ses Freres  | on sheet in pencil: 2-275
title: Joseph Recognized by his Brothers
